name: Figma
title: figma.com
shortDescription: Figma is a design platform that facilitates collaboration among teams by integrating interface design and prototyping into a single tool. It is designed for designers, developers, and project teams to streamline the creation of digital products. An example use case is a tech startup using Figma to design, prototype, and collaborate on a new mobile app, ensuring all stakeholders can provide feedback in real-time.
